explains: adj. 有希望的，有前途的
v. 承诺，答应；使很可能，预示（promise 的现在分词形式）
wordGroup: promising future n. 发展前景；光明的前途
promising market 发展潜力大的市场；有销路的市场

sentences.en: He was voted most promising new director.
sentences.cn: 他当选为最有前途的新导演。

sentences.en: She shamed her father into promising more help.
sentences.cn: 她使父亲感到过意不去，只好答应多给她些帮助。

sentences.en: She is among the most promising players in her age group.
sentences.cn: 在她那个年龄组中她是最有前途的选手之一。
